verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H559>"Moreover,<s%> you shall tell the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H376><s%> 'Anyone of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> or of the <S%H1616>strangers<s%> who live as <S%H1481>foreigners<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> who <S%H5414>gives<s%> any of his <S%H2233>seed<s%> to <S%H4432>Molech;<s%> he shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%> The <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H7275>stone<s%> him with <S%H7275>stones.<s%>

I also will <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> against that <S%H376>person,<s%> and will cut him <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> because he has <S%H5414>given<s%> of his <S%H2233>seed<s%> to <S%H4432>Molech,<s%> to <S%H2930>defile<s%> my <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> and to <S%H2490>profane<s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name.<s%>

If the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H5956>all<s%> <S%H5956>hide<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> from that <S%H376>person,<s%> when he <S%H5414>gives<s%> of his <S%H2233>seed<s%> to <S%H4432>Molech,<s%> and <S%H1115>don't<s%> put him to <S%H4191>death;<s%>

then I will <S%H7760>set<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> against that <S%H376>man,<s%> and against his <S%H4940>family,<s%> and will cut him <S%H3772>off,<s%> and all who play the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H2181>him,<s%> to play the prostitute with <S%H4432>Molech,<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> their <S%H5971>people.<s%>

<S%H5315><s%>"'The person that <S%H6437>turns<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> those who are <S%H3049>mediums,<s%> and <S%H310>to<s%> the <S%H3049>wizards,<s%> to play the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5414>them,<s%> I will even set my <S%H6440>face<s%> against that <S%H5315>person,<s%> and will cut him <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> his <S%H5971>people.<s%>
<S%H6942><s%>"'Sanctify yourselves <S%H6918>therefore,<s%> and be holy; for I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
You shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3068>them.<s%> I am Yahweh who sanctifies <S%H6942>you.<s%>

<S%H376><s%>"'For everyone who <S%H7043>curses<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> or his <S%H517>mother<s%> shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death:<s%> he has <S%H7043>cursed<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> or his <S%H517>mother;<s%> his blood shall be upon <S%H1818>him.<s%>

<S%H376><s%>"'The man who commits <S%H5003>adultery<s%> with another <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H802>wife,<s%> even he who commits <S%H5003>adultery<s%> with his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H802>wife,<s%> the <S%H5003>adulterer<s%> and the <S%H5003>adulteress<s%> shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

<S%H376><s%>"'The man who <S%H7901>lies<s%> with his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%> has <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H6172>nakedness:<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death;<s%> their blood shall be upon <S%H1818>them.<s%>

<S%H376><s%>"'If a man <S%H7901>lies<s%> with his <S%H3618>daughter-in<s%>-law, <S%H8147>both<s%> of them shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death:<s%> they have <S%H6213>committed<s%> a <S%H8397>perversion;<s%> their blood shall be upon <S%H1818>them.<s%>

<S%H376><s%>"'If a man <S%H7901>lies<s%> with a <S%H2145>male,<s%> as <S%H4904>with<s%> a <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them have <S%H6213>committed<s%> an <S%H8441>abomination:<s%> they shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death;<s%> their blood shall be upon <S%H1818>them.<s%>

<S%H376><s%>"'If a man <S%H3947>takes<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> and her <S%H517>mother,<s%> it is <S%H2154>wickedness:<s%> they shall be <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> both he and <S%H2154>they;<s%> that there may be no wickedness among <S%H8432>you.<s%>
<S%H376><s%>"'If a man <S%H5414>lies<s%> with an <S%H929>animal,<s%> he shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death;<s%> and you shall <S%H2026>kill<s%> the <S%H929>animal.<s%>

<S%H802><s%>"'If a woman <S%H7126>approaches<s%> any <S%H929>animal,<s%> and lies <S%H7250>down<s%> with <S%H2026>it,<s%> you shall kill the <S%H802>woman,<s%> and the <S%H929>animal:<s%> they shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death;<s%> their blood shall be upon <S%H1818>them.<s%>

<S%H376><s%>"'If a man <S%H3947>takes<s%> his <S%H269>sister,<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> and <S%H7200>sees<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness,<s%> and she <S%H7200>sees<s%> his <S%H6172>nakedness;<s%> it is a shameful <S%H2617>thing;<s%> and they shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the children of their <S%H5971>people:<s%> he has <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> his <S%H269>sister<s%>'s <S%H6172>nakedness;<s%> he shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> his <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

<S%H376><s%>"'If a man <S%H7901>lies<s%> with a <S%H802>woman<s%> having her monthly <S%H1739>period,<s%> and <S%H1540>uncovers<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness;<s%> he has made <S%H6168>naked<s%> her <S%H4726>fountain,<s%> and she has <S%H6168>uncovered<s%> the <S%H4726>fountain<s%> of her <S%H1818>blood:<s%> and <S%H8147>both<s%> of them shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> their <S%H5971>people.<s%>

<S%H1540><s%>"'You shall not uncover the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H269>sister,<s%> nor of your <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H269>sister;<s%> for he has made <S%H6168>naked<s%> his close <S%H7607>relative:<s%> they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

If a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7901>lies<s%> with his <S%H1733>uncle<s%>'s wife, he has <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> his <S%H1730>uncle<s%>'s <S%H6172>nakedness:<s%> they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H2399>sin;<s%> they shall <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H6185>childless.<s%>

<S%H376><s%>"'If a man <S%H3947>takes<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%>'s <S%H802>wife,<s%> it is an <S%H5079>impurity:<s%> he has <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%>'s <S%H6172>nakedness;<s%> they shall be <S%H6185>childless.<s%>

<S%H8104><s%>"'You shall therefore keep all my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and all my <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H776>them;<s%> that the land, where I am <S%H935>bringing<s%> you to <S%H3427>dwell,<s%> may not vomit you <S%H6958>out.<s%>

You shall not <S%H3212>walk<s%> in the <S%H2708>customs<s%> of the <S%H1471>nation,<s%> which I am casting <S%H7971>out<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6213>you:<s%> for they did all these <S%H6973>things,<s%> and therefore I abhorred them.

But I have <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3423>you,<s%> "You shall inherit their <S%H127>land,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it to you to <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H776>it,<s%> a land <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey.<s%>" I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> who has <S%H914>separated<s%> you from the <S%H5971>peoples.<s%>

<S%H914><s%>"'You shall therefore make a distinction between the <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H929>animal<s%> and the <S%H2931>unclean,<s%> and between the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H5775>fowl<s%> and the <S%H2889>clean:<s%> and you shall not make <S%H5315>yourselves<s%> <S%H8262>abominable<s%> by <S%H929>animal,<s%> or by <S%H5775>bird,<s%> or by anything with <S%H7430>which<s%> the <S%H127>ground<s%> <S%H914>teems,<s%> which I have separated from you as unclean for <S%H2930>you.<s%>
You shall be <S%H6918>holy<s%> to <S%H3068>me:<s%> for I, Yahweh, am <S%H6918>holy,<s%> and have <S%H914>set<s%> you apart from the <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> that you should be mine.

<S%H376><s%>"'A man or a <S%H802>woman<s%> that <S%H3588>is<s%> a <S%H178>medium,<s%> or is a <S%H3049>wizard,<s%> shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death:<s%> they shall <S%H7275>stone<s%> them with <S%H7275>stones;<s%> their blood shall be upon <S%H1818>them.<s%>'"
